listings.title: Luxury Beachfront Villa
listings.description: Stunning beachfront villa with panoramic ocean views, private pool, and modern amenities. Perfect for a luxurious getaway.

listings.title: Cozy Mountain Cabin
listings.description: Rustic mountain cabin with breathtaking views, fireplace, and hiking trails nearby. Ideal for nature lovers.

listings.title: Downtown Loft
listings.description: Modern loft in the heart of the city, walking distance to restaurants and attractions. Perfect for urban explorers.

listings.title: Desert Oasis
listings.description: Unique desert retreat with private hot tub, stunning sunset views, and modern amenities. Perfect for a romantic getaway.

listings.title: Lakefront Cottage
listings.description: Charming cottage on the lake with private dock, kayaks, and fishing equipment. Perfect for water enthusiasts.

listings.title: Historic Brownstone
listings.description: Beautifully restored brownstone in a historic neighborhood, featuring original details and modern comforts.

listings.title: Tropical Treehouse
listings.description: Unique treehouse experience in a tropical setting, surrounded by nature and wildlife. Perfect for adventure seekers.

listings.title: Wine Country Villa
listings.description: Elegant villa in the heart of wine country, featuring a private vineyard tour and wine tasting experience.

listings.title: Urban Penthouse
listings.description: Luxurious penthouse with rooftop terrace, city views, and high-end finishes. Perfect for a sophisticated stay.

listings.title: Seaside Bungalow
listings.description: Charming bungalow steps from the beach, featuring a private patio and outdoor shower. Perfect for beach lovers.

reviews.title: Amazing stay!
reviews.comment: The property was exactly as described. Clean, modern, and in a great location. The host was very responsive and helpful.
reviews.ownerResponse: Thank you for your kind words! We're glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to host you again soon.

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.comment: Very comfortable stay with all amenities as promised. The view was spectacular!
